A game where anything you desire is withing reach. Be the hero of your very own story in this grand adventure.

The Legendary Prophecy of Light and Darkness: The Power to Save the World

Story:
In a world where evil reigns supreme, one boy will rise against the odds to not only save himself and his family, but the entire world. But is a world already ruled by fear and death even worth saving anymore?
Is it wise to trust everyone you come across?
Only time will tell.
Characters:

Satan(Protagonist): A kind boy living on a farm with his siblings, mother and uncle. Almost too kind for his own good.

Bumblebee: A mysterious man with strange abilities and beautiful blonde hair. He is Satan's lover.

Tough Guy: A man fighting to save the world from the shadows.

Stephanie and The Man: Satan's twin siblings. 

Uncle Chip: The uncle of the triplets, Satan, Setaphnie, and The Man. He is a cruel being who rules over his family with fear.
